---
title: Roster
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
dt  <- read_csv("./data/ASU Geotech Roster.csv")
roster  <- dt[order(dt$'Last Name'),]
roster %>%
  datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
            options = list(dom = 'Bfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf'),
                           iDisplayLength = 100))
```
